column4: Okay, my wireless card is detected, and configured, but it doesn't seem to be finding the wireless connection right next to me?
Trying to catch a mouse... What kind of encryption on wireless network?
What's that iwlist command to list networks - you using that or network manager?
sudo iwconfig shows eth0 or eth1 connected?
iwconfig lists the wifi net adapter (Im hard wired right now)  but the issue is that the supposively okay wifi card isn't picking up on networks
Just a longshot, but restart dbus? :)
use tab to autocomplete name in IM ;)
Tab complete makes life easier :) I was using IRC for a while b4 I figured it out :(
Oh, I do too.  On my desktop.
prolly under your home folder in hidden .opera folder ?
